meanings.definition: In a way that shows a lack of foresight or narrow-mindedness.
meanings.sent1: He myopically made decisions without considering the long-term consequences.
meanings.sent2: She myopically refused to listen to any other opinions.
meanings.sent3: The myopically stubborn cat refused to try any new food.
meanings.sent4: His myopically focused mind couldn't see the bigger picture.
meanings.sent5: The myopically selfish behavior led to isolation and loneliness.

meanings.definition: With a narrow field of vision or focus.
meanings.sent1: The myopically focused student only saw what was directly in front of him.
meanings.sent2: The myopically designed camera could only capture objects up close.
meanings.sent3: The myopically decorated room had everything crammed into one corner.
meanings.sent4: Her myopically chosen path led to missed opportunities on the sides.
meanings.sent5: The myopically painted landscape looked like a close-up photograph.
